Summary: Bright White Light going thru the clouds disappearing and reappearing
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Harrisburg
There were no other sightings in Harrisburg on or around September 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness reports a Bright White light, brighter than anything she has ever seen. The white light moved quickly across the sky changing directions and punching a hole in the clouds. It disappeared and then reappeared abruptly.
